section.data-hide: The Nashua Board of Education reaffirms its position of compliance with applicable State and Federal laws of non-discrimination on the basis of race, color, national origin, religion, sex, sexual orientation, physical or mental disability, marital status, familial status, genetic information and age in admission to, access to, treatment in, or employment in the services, programs and activities of the Nashua School District.

div.p: The Nashua Board of Education reaffirms its position of compliance with applicable State and Federal laws of non-discrimination on the basis of race, color, national origin, religion, sex, sexual orientation, physical or mental disability, marital status, familial status, genetic information and age in admission to, access to, treatment in, or employment in the services, programs and activities of the Nashua School District.
